MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G21 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:41AM emergency response team have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45AM. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 5:08 AM on Saturday, 20 March 2021
